dmca.title: Google DMCA - Anthony Marquis
dmca.body:
Anthony Marquis
Flat 56 (Block 'C') Stepney Green Court
Stepney Green
London
E1 3LL

Tel: (0203) 069 2081
Mobile: 07723 505 310
Email: amarquis06@aol.com

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View
CA 94043

Tuesday, 21 November 2006

Re: Website Copyright Infringement and Product Theft.

Dear Sir/Madam,

1) The copyrighted work at issue is both the text and the graphics of my IPG football permutations that appears on:

http://www.emediadirect.co.uk/football.pools.systems.html
http://www.members.lycos.co.uk/winthefootballpools
http://www.actionebooks.co.uk/football.pools.systems.html

The publisher of the above websites has indirectly obtained my IPG System Guide book and Software and has taken it upon himself to sell my copyrighted 20 free football pools permutations as his own ebook from his sites. He has also copied my website sales and content material ever since my first website went online.

I have the following documentation, which ca be made available to both yourselves at Google and anyone who wishes to view it:

Affidavit
